title: Pitha Festival
description: Our Pitha festival 2026 will be held on IU Center beside the Shonga campus of Northwestern University on 2 February 2026

title: Welcome to the New Notice Board
description: This is the first dynamic notice on the new system. Admins can now add and manage notices directly.
content: We are excited to launch this new feature. Notices posted here will be visible to all students and faculty.
